description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a LightningJS Component 'RecipeDetail' which displays detailed information about a recipe, including an image, ingredients list, and steps, with scrolling and theme support.

methods.name: appTheme
methods.description: Returns the application's theme object used for styling.

methods.name: titleText
methods.description: Provides the title text for the recipe, or a default value.

methods.name: subtitleText
methods.description: Provides the subtitle or description for the recipe.

methods.name: imageSrc
methods.description: Determines the image source URL for the recipe image.

methods.name: ingredients
methods.description: Returns the list of ingredients for the recipe.

methods.name: steps
methods.description: Returns the list of preparation steps for the recipe.

methods.name: accent
methods.description: Returns the accent color from theme for styling headers.

methods.name: contentText
methods.description: Returns the text color from theme for content text.

methods.name: mutedText
methods.description: Returns a semi-transparent version of the theme's text color for muted text.
